thread.title: Five Star Experience in Excellent Service!!!
thread.title_full: Five Star Experience in Excellent Service!!! - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: suele2016
title: Five Star Experience in Excellent Service!!!
text: We were celebrating a very special birthday for my mother and the Benjamin went over and above making it absolutely wonderful!!! The warm welcome they offered us and the very special extra touches were just exceptional. We were so impressed and just so pleased every moment of our stay. The Benjamin's excellence in service sets them apart from all the other hotels in New York!! It's been my go-to place whenever I visit Manhattan and I can assure you I won't be going anywhere else!! Thank you to Gul, the General Manager, and her entire staff for helping us create some wonderful memories for a very happy occasion!!
